mapper.sql: p.id, p.parent_id, p.`name`, p.description, p.`type`, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.create_user, update_user
mapper.insert: insert into permissions (parent_id, `name`, description, `type`, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into permissions
parent_id,
`name`,
description,
`type`,
create_time,
update_time,
create_user,
update_user,

mapper.update:
update permissions
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update permissions set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from permissions p JOIN role_permissions rp on p.id = rp.permissions_id where rp.role_id in (#{roleIds})
